name: Duality (itch) (Edega-Student)
description:
Duality

Explore the twin worlds. There are two worlds that are one, use them both to progress the level.

Controls

WASD for movement, spacebar for short jump(in case of getting stuck)

DATT 3300 Information

Link to documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qCQ7u7CSK7k-VukmE2UFyPpFHUYoDf2_/view?usp=shari...

Name: Emmanuel Dega

Lab #1

Notes:

This is one of my first games and I am always looking for improvement. Please feel free to leave a comment about your experience with the game both good and bad if possible. Thank you.
